thread.title: BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says ‍Acquisition Of Ramm Technologies Proprietary Limited​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says ‍Acquisition Of Ramm Technologies Proprietary Limited​

organizations.name: brief-jasco electronics says ‍acquisition of ramm technologies proprietary limited

text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Jasco Electronics Holdings Ltd:
* ‍ACQUISITION OF RAMM TECHNOLOGIES PROPRIETARY LIMITED​ * ‍IN TERMS OF TRANSACTION AGREEMENT, JASCO WILL ACQUIRE 51% OF RAMM FOR A MAXIMUM AGGREGATE PURCHASE PRICE OF R30,6 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
